duck: Computing - Computing is any goal-oriented activity requiring, benefiting from, or creating computers.
computation definition: the act or action of computing.
Reversible computation - Reversible computing is a model of computing where the computational process to some extent is reversible, i.e., time-invertible.
Physical information - In physics, physical information refers generally to the information that is contained in a physical system.
Computation is any type of calculation or use of computing technology in information processing.
Hypercomputation - Hypercomputation or super-Turing computation refers to models of computation that go beyond, or are incomparable to, Turing computability.
Real computation - In computability theory, the theory of real computation deals with hypothetical computing machines using infinite-precision real numbers.

wiki.text:
'Computation' is any type of calculation<ref>http://www.merriam-
webster.com/dictionary/computation</ref> or use of computing technology in
information processing.<ref>[http://www.merriam-
webster.com/dictionary/computation Computation] from the Free Merriam-Webster
Dictionary</ref><ref>http://www.answers.com/topic/computation</ref> Computation
is a process following a well-defined model understood and expressed as, for
example, an algorithm, or a protocol.

The study of computation is paramount to the discipline of computer science.
wiki.title: Computation
